definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: I instrumented the server source code to obtain the packets scanned counter.
sentences.chinese: 我測試了服務器的源代碼以獲得掃描包的計數器。

sentences.english: The width of count time and display style can be set respectively by keyboard .
sentences.chinese: 計數器的計數時間寬度和顯示方式由鍵盤設定。

sentences.english: Spa-Like Bathrooms W/Quartz Counters & Double Sinks.
sentences.chinese: 溫泉般的浴室與石英計數器和雙水槽。

sentences.english: It then returns the value of the counter.
sentences.chinese: 該函數然後返回計數器的值。

sentences.english: That's true for the first counter update.
sentences.chinese: 第一個計數器更新確實是這樣。

sentences.english: Both public and private EMON counters may be used for software and hardware tuning.
sentences.chinese: 公用和私用EMON計數器都可用於軟件和硬件調諧。

sentences.english: An optional gamma counting NaI well is also available.
sentences.chinese: 該計數器還有一個可選的伽瑪計數碘化鈉孔。

sentences.english: Just connect a frequency counter to this pin, and it will display your bus frequency.
sentences.chinese: 僅連接一個頻率計數器到這個管腳，顯示總線頻率。

sentences.english: I often try to double-check a counter the first time I add it to a report.
sentences.chinese: 我經常嘗試仔細檢查我第一次添加到報告的計數器。

sentences.english: This method uses two counters and a two-line input port only.
sentences.chinese: 硬件只用兩個計數器和一個二路電平輸入口。

sentences.english: Inside supposes four figures automatic counters.
sentences.chinese: 內設四位數自動計數器。

sentences.english: Cymometer gate circuit and by the time counter composition.
sentences.chinese: 頻率計由時間閘門電路和計數器組成。

sentences.english: The tree view shows the host and all of its respective counter groups and counters.
sentences.chinese: 樹型視圖顯示出主機及其所有的計數器組和計數器。

sentences.english: The tree view shows the host and all of its respective counter groups and counters.
sentences.chinese: 樹型視圖顯示出主機及其所有的計數器組和計數器。

sentences.english: An abacus is also a counting machine, using our brain and our fingers.
sentences.chinese: 算盤也是一臺計數器，用人們的頭腦和手指來操做。

definition: a device used to check money and detect counterfeit bills
to shoot a bird (with a gun, slingshot etc)/to photograph birds
lit. the river that divides Chu and Han/fig. a line that divides rival territories/the mid-line between sides on a Chinese chessboard
